channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
So one thing I've learned while writing about David Broza's album of Shabbat eve prayers that will be released on Thursday is the source of my Broza blindspot.
It turns out that my peak years of consuming Israeli music precisely coincided with his years of living in the U.S. and releasing an English-only album.
Your occasional reminder that not all Star Trek content is kosher for Passover. https://t.co/r5IeBfZfQH
@Yair_Rosenberg @kampeas @CoryBooker In case you were wondering, the Otter transliteration of Gam zu l'tova is "Godzilla cova."
"The US-Saudi alliance, which goes all the way back to the 1940s, seems to have been replaced by a Saudi-Trump alliance." https://t.co/dJ04YOW3TL via @TPM
@trekonomics Allow me to recommend Action Philosophers. Big history of ideas of Philo 101 with jokes. https://t.co/IzTv4dKeaX
@trekonomics Great teaching is miraculously transparent.
@MyNameIsAviJ And chol hamoed Sukkot. Only reason I can imagine that this was not still a legend a mere 25 years later when I enrolled.
@LavenderNRed @ArielElyseGold @adanielroth Growing up in Rochester, we were never surprised by the April snow the prophet Elijah brought each spring.
@prof_dainy Actually, we left that out to avoid an unpleasant gematria in the PDF file size. #NusachSfard
@BudrykZack @RottenInDenmark So much Douglas Coupland erasure in these replies.

Hard to believe that an obsessive focus on imaginary Long Island Boomers would be the end of American democracy, but here we are. https://t.co/IJEMz2QLNk
I imagine William Levitt would be perversely proud. https://t.co/nkaDsVFWFO
Meanwhile, I’m perversely wondering how one might craft a lawsuit to reinstate restrictive housing covenants overturned by a liberal Supreme Court. Clearly, there are questions of standing. But where there’s a Federalist will, there’s a Federalist way.
@RFfromMass @drewdellinger In hindsight, I regret not trying much harder.

@GothamGirlBlue The party’s silence is telling us we’re crazy for being worried about climate change, crazed Republicans judges, or covid.
@GothamGirlBlue Hard to support a man or a party who tells us we’re crazy for seeing the other party as an existential threat.
Not a nice question for me to be asking during chol hamoed, I know…. https://t.co/jUdc56kWwE
@atrubek The lesson is that Tom Lehrer, may he live to 120, is the Messiah.

@whstancil What do you see that group doing?
@whstancil It feels like all the existing liberal groups have gone very, very quiet, other than fundraising. As if the word has come from n high, shh! Don’t make a fuss!
@atrubek Definitely need to make “discoing the publisher” a thing.
@prof_dainy Bergen County would like to have a word with you….
@eddyportnoy Stick shift guide for first (and only) Yiddish-designed automobile.
Again: Trumpism is going to kill more Americans. The question is, why? https://t.co/v1vyssMGpP
@AvBronstein Fox family values!
@swordsjew I think you confused him with a former Teaneck deputy mayor again. https://t.co/XPDDbIU0AL
@DandiaAsad Fun fact about Leo Trotsky: He would not be at all surprised. (Have you seen Trotksy's paragraph about the Forward?)
@prof_dainy Well, it does have your name on it. https://t.co/wK0W9vLNBT
